items.content_html: Pok√©mon Game App is a React application built with Vite, featuring: A homepage with Pok√©mon listings fetched from the PokeAPI. Detailed stats and type information for each Pok√©mon. A battle system that calculates outcomes based on stats and type advantages. This lightweight app delivers a fast, responsive, and fun Pok√©mon experience for fans!
